dt: {bc}the quality or state of being real
{bc}a real event, entity, or state of affairs
{bc}the totality of real things and events
{bc}something that is neither derivative nor dependent but exists necessarily
{bc}television programming that features videos of actual occurrences (such as a police chase, stunt, or natural disaster)

shortdef: the quality or state of being real
a real event, entity, or state of affairs
the totality of real things and events

dt: {bc}an artificial environment which is experienced through sensory stimuli (such as sights and sounds) provided by a computer and in which one's actions partially determine what happens in the environment
{bc}the technology used to create or access a virtual reality

shortdef: an artificial environment which is experienced through sensory stimuli (such as sights and sounds) provided by a computer and in which one's actions partially determine what happens in the environment; also : the technology used to create or access a virtual reality
